name: Red belt review
tagline: Preparation for Coding Dojo Red Belt Exam  (LAMP STACK)
body:
# Red_Belt_Review
Application using CodeIgniter where in logged users are able to view and add reviews for a particular book. Logged user can also delete his own reviews.

A Coding Dojo assignment

Technologies used:
PHP,
Javascript,
MySQL,
HTML,
CSS,
CodeIgniter,
jQuery,
Twitter Bootstrap
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
